title: >>> RUMORS Welcome
body_text:
A favorite here on the dodgeball website ... It's "RUMORS Welcome"!
What will be of DODGEBALL 28 and its aftermath? Perhaps these statements can give some clues.
~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~
I.
At the present time, there is no DODGEBALL 28 logo.
II.
Lenny Herrera might miss his first event at DODGEBALL 28.
III.
Bill Plantz, Travis Mills, and Zach Katz have all claimed to be "finished" with dodgeball.
IV.
Kevin "Fitz" could be out of action due to a shoulder surgery.
~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~
True? Untrue?
It's all up to you.
